title: Revert default displayed name to previous value

requirements.text: Change the appâ€™s default displayed name back to the previous default ("Ghazal") so that on first load the large name header and the editable name input are prefilled with "Ghazal" instead of "Hina Sadat".
acceptanceCriteria: On a fresh page load, the main name header displays "Ghazal" by default.
On a fresh page load, the name input field value is "Ghazal" by default.
The user can still edit the name and the header updates live as they type.
No other app text, behaviors, or styling change as part of this update.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Keep all backend logic in the single Motoko actor (no backend changes are needed for this request).
